Patients stratify accord disease type ( anaplastic large cell lymphoma v mantle cell lymphoma vs Hodgkin 's lymphoma ) . Patients receive 17-N-allylamino-17-demethoxygeldanamycin ( 17-AAG ) IV 1 hour day 1 , 4 , 8 , 11 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
